Yue-pcc.title: A lightweight feature-based DNN method for image Auto White Balance.
Yue-pcc.note: This patent covers methods for implementing Auto White Balance (AWB) in pure color scenes using a Multilayer Perceptron(MLP).

Yue-dmcc.title: A lightweight dual-mapping method for cross-sensor Auto White Balance.
Yue-dmcc.note: This patent covers methods to tackle degraded performance when DNN-based AWB encounters new sensors.

Yue-tmo1.title: Image processing method, system, movable platform and storage medium.
Yue-tmo1.note: This patent covers methods for implementing a tone mapping operators(TMO) for UAV challenge cases.

Yuet-tmo2.title: Image processing method, system, movable platform and storage medium.
Yuet-tmo2.note: This patent application covers methods for implementing an adaptive TMO for challenging scenarios in automotive scenes.
